titles: The ethiques of Aristotle, that is to saye, preceptes of good behauoute [sic] and perfighte honestie, now newly tra[n]slated into English
author: Aristotle.
Wilkinson, John, servant to the Earl of Derby.
Latini, Brunetto, 1220-1295.
publisher: In the parishe of Christes Church within new gate by Richard Grafton, printer too our soueraigne lorde Kyng Edward the. VI.,
notes: A translation by John Wilkinson, whose name appears in the heading to the preface, of an abridgment by Brunetto Latini of: Nicomachean ethics.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
